translation.en: [man 1] Where do you want to start?
translation.zh: 你想从哪里开始呢？

translation.en: I guess at the beginning somewhere.
translation.zh: 我猜是从开始说起吧

translation.en: It was a crazy beginning.
translation.zh: 开始阶段特别疯狂

translation.en: -Crazy. -[interviewer] What was the beginning?
translation.zh: 疯狂 开始阶段是怎么样的？

translation.en: [man 2] Animal people are nuts, man.
translation.zh: 跟动物打交道的人都很疯狂

translation.en: And I might be one of them people.
translation.zh: 我也许也是其中之一

translation.en: I don't know,
translation.zh: 我也说不好

translation.en: but they're all half-out there, man. They're crazy.
translation.zh: 但他们都很不理智 都很疯狂

translation.en: [man 3] You know, the monkey people are a little bit different.
translation.zh: 养猴子的人有点不同

translation.en: [handler] Okay, good boy! Good boy!
translation.zh: 好的 乖猴儿

translation.en: You know, they're kinda strange,
translation.zh: 你懂的 他们有点怪异

translation.en: but the big cat people are back-stabbing...
translation.zh: 但养大猫的人都会暗箭伤人

translation.en: pieces of shit.
translation.zh: 都是混蛋

translation.en: [reporter 1] A decades-long feud comes to a bizarre end--
translation.zh: 几十年的宿怨离奇地结束了…

translation.en: [reporter 2] Tiger King stands accused of trying to have a woman killed.
translation.zh: 虎王被指控企图杀害一名妇女

translation.en: [man 2] You know, there's not every day that a zookeeper went to prison
translation.zh: 你知道 不是每一天 都有动物园管理员因为雇凶杀人

translation.en: for murder-for-hire.
translation.zh: 而进监狱的

translation.en: So, I'm sure--
translation.zh: 所以我敢肯定…

translation.en: I'm sure y'all got a story to tell.
translation.zh: 你们绝对有故事可讲

translation.en: [operator] This is a prepaid call from...
translation.zh: 这通预付费电话来自…

translation.en: [man 4] Joe Exotic.
translation.zh: 乔野生

translation.en: [operator] ...an inmate at the Grady County Jail.
translation.zh: 格雷迪郡监狱的一名囚犯

translation.en: [Joe] Do you know what they threatened me with? Seventy-nine years.
translation.zh: 你知道他们用什么威胁我吗？79年

translation.en: I went to work every day prepared to die in a tiger cage.
translation.zh: 我每天去上班 都做好了要死在老虎笼子里的心理准备

translation.en: -[tiger roaring] -Dying doesn't scare me.
translation.zh: 死亡并不会吓到我

translation.en: At all.
translation.zh: 完全不会

translation.en: [reporter 3] Here is a fact that may make you stop for a second.
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创纪录片系列 有一个事实可能会让你深思

translation.en: There are more captive tigers in the US today
translation.zh: 今天美国的圈养老虎

translation.en: than there are in the wild throughout the world.
translation.zh: 比全世界的野生老虎还多

translation.en: -[lions growling] -Come here, you sexy beast!
translation.zh: 过来吧 性感的野兽！

translation.en: [man 5] Hi, little man.
translation.zh: 你好 小家伙

translation.en: Look at that big smile. There you go. Show them claws.
translation.zh: 笑一个 这就对了 给他们看看爪子

translation.en: [man 6] You would not believe how many sheriffs told me,
translation.zh: 你不会相信 有多少警长告诉过我

translation.en: "Oh yeah, just down the street,
translation.zh: “是啊 就在这条街尽头

translation.en: there's a guy that has a lion," or, "A guy down there that has a tiger."
translation.zh: 有一个人养狮子”或者“有一个人养老虎”

translation.en: They just feel very strongly that these are mine
translation.zh: 他们坚定地认为 这些是我的

translation.en: and nobody's gonna take 'em from me.
translation.zh: 任何人都不能把它们带走

translation.en: -[roars] -[man 7] I'll tell you, it's real simple.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 其实很简单

translation.en: Don't own big, dangerous, exotic animals 'cause it's a time bomb.
translation.zh: 不要饲养危险大型野生动物因为它们是定时炸弹

translation.en: Everybody has a story.
translation.zh: 每人都有一段故事

translation.en: Everybody that's owned one, it's always been a bad, bad ending.
translation.zh: 养这种动物的人 结局往往很糟糕

translation.en: I've been doing this 20 years. Never even been bit.
translation.zh: 我都养了20年了 从来没被咬过

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Our mission is to ban the private possession
translation.zh: 我们的任务是禁止私人饲养

translation.en: of these magnificent animals.
translation.zh: 这些美丽的动物

translation.en: [man 1] She wanted to shut down the zoo.
translation.zh: 她想关闭动物园

translation.en: And he wanted her gone.
translation.zh: 他想让她消失

translation.en: [reporter 4] The so-called Tiger King--
translation.zh: 所谓的虎王…

translation.en: [reporter 5] He is on trial, accused in a murder-for-hire plot.
translation.zh: 他正在接受审判被指控犯有雇凶杀人罪

translation.en: [reporter 6] Joe Exotic is accused of paying a person to murder Carole Baskin.
translation.zh: 乔野生被指控花钱雇人谋杀卡罗·巴斯金

translation.en: [woman] Long before he was ever indicted in these charges,
translation.zh: 早在他被指控这些罪名之前

translation.en: Joe Exotic was someone that makes good TV, makes good news.
translation.zh: 以乔野生为主题的电视节目和新闻很精彩

translation.en: Even if it's a train wreck, you can't help but look.
translation.zh: 即使惨不忍睹 也会忍不住去看

translation.en: He's a completely insane, gay, gun-toting, drug-addict fanatic.
translation.zh: 他是一个彻头彻尾的疯子同性恋、持枪、吸毒

translation.en: [man 1] He wasn't real.
translation.zh: 他不是真实的存在

translation.en: He was like a mythical character,
translation.zh: 他就像一个神话人物

translation.en: living out in the middle of Bumfuck, Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 住在俄克拉荷马州的某个地方

translation.en: [reporter 4] The well-known zoo owner was taken into custody.
translation.zh: 那位著名的动物园主人被拘留了

translation.en: [reporter 5] He could be looking at nearly 80 years in prison.
translation.zh: 他可能面临着将近80年的监禁

translation.en: [Joe] When I leave this park, I wear a bulletproof vest.
translation.zh: 离开动物园时 我都会穿着防弹背心

translation.en: That is how bad this has gotten.
translation.zh: 情况就是这么糟糕

translation.en: There are so many strange twists in that story.
translation.zh: 那段故事有许多奇怪的转折

translation.en: You would have to write books,
translation.zh: 足够写一本书了

translation.en: volumes of the stuff that went wrong there.
translation.zh: 各种各样的东西都走偏了

translation.en: Let me show and tell the whole thing.
translation.zh: 让我完完整整地告诉你

translation.en: Because then you'll get it.
translation.zh: 然后你就会明白了

translation.en: Then you'll say, "Jesus fucking Christ! Why are you in jail?"
translation.zh: 然后你就会说：“我的天啊 你为什么会进监狱？”

translation.en: [interviewer] Okay, this is good. All right.
translation.zh: 好的 这样就行 好吗？

translation.en: And how old is she?
translation.zh: 它多大了？

translation.en: [snake owner] She's 23 years old.
translation.zh: 23岁了

translation.en: [interviewer] When I started this project,
translation.zh: 当我开始这个项目时

translation.en: I had no idea it would consume five years of my life...
translation.zh: 我不知道它会耗时五年

translation.en: and end up as ugly as it did.
translation.zh: （埃里克·古德 电影制作人） 而且结局如此不堪

translation.en: It all began when I was investigating
translation.zh: 一切都始于我前往南佛罗里达

translation.en: a notorious reptile dealer in South Florida.
translation.zh: 调查一名臭名昭著的爬行动物贩子

translation.en: [dealer] See how the snake stresses? That's when the venom shoots out.
translation.zh: 看到蛇紧张了吗？它就要喷射毒液了

translation.en: That's enough to kill everybody in this room three, four times over.
translation.zh: 这足够杀死这间屋子里的人三、四遍了

translation.en: [Goode] A guy showed up one day wanting to buy a venomous snake.
translation.zh: 有一天 一个人想买一条毒蛇

translation.en: We haven't even offered them for sale yet. These are those real young ones, you know.
translation.zh: 这些还没有正式出售 这些都很小

translation.en: [Goode] When he was leaving, he said,
translation.zh: 当他离开时 他说

translation.en: "Check out what I just bought."
translation.zh: “看看我刚买了什么”

translation.en: In the back of this guy's van was a snow leopard.
translation.zh: 这家伙的货车后面有一只雪豹

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: It was 100 degrees outside.
translation.zh: 外面气温将近38度

translation.en: Do they need to be refrigerated? You know, 'cause they--
translation.zh: 需要冷藏降温吗？我是说 因为它们…

translation.en: [dealer] Not if they're acclimated in Florida,
translation.zh: 不用 它们适应佛罗里达了

translation.en: if they're born and raised here.
translation.zh: 它们是在这里出生和长大的

translation.en: [Goode] Are these as rare as the clouded leopard? These are rarer than the clouded leopard.
translation.zh: -它们跟云豹一样罕见吗？-它们比云豹罕见

translation.en: [Goode] It just blew my mind.
translation.zh: 他让我大吃一惊

translation.en: What is a snow leopard doing in the back of this guy's hot van?
translation.zh: 这家伙的车里那么热雪豹在里面干什么？

translation.en: That set me on this journey to really understand what is going on
translation.zh: 这让我踏上了这趟旅程 去真正了解

translation.en: with people keeping big cats in this country.
translation.zh: 人们在这个国家养大猫是怎么回事

translation.en: Oh, little girl.
translation.zh: 哦 小家伙

translation.en: -[woman] Maybe take it off? -Oh, you don't want me to take it off.
translation.zh: 要不摘掉吧？ 你不会希望我摘掉的

translation.en: [Goode] I like it off.
translation.zh: 摘掉挺好

translation.en: Your whole audience will say, "Oh my god, that guy has a mullet!"
translation.zh: 观众们会说：“天啊 那家伙是鲻鱼头发型呀！”

translation.en: [Goode] No, I like it. I like it!
translation.zh: 没事 我很喜欢！

translation.en: Jamotti! Jamotti, my sexy tiger!
translation.zh: 佳莫提！佳莫提 我的性感小老虎！

translation.en: [Goode] You raised these from babies?
translation.zh: 你从小饲养它们的吗？

translation.en: [Joe] These were grown up in my house, yup.
translation.zh: 是啊 它们是在我家长大的

translation.en: We've got, like, eight of 'em in there now.
translation.zh: 我们现在已经有八只了

translation.en: People, every day, they're like...
translation.zh: 人们每天都会说

translation.en: "You must have the most incredible life, to live with 187 big cats."
translation.zh: “跟187只大猫生活在一起你的生活一定很不可思议吧”

translation.en: I started building this in 1999.
translation.zh: 我是1999年开始建的

translation.en: Believe it or not, this was a completely empty field.
translation.zh: 无论你是否相信 这里曾是一片空地

translation.en: In over 16 years, it's grown into this.
translation.zh: 16年间 这里建成这样了

translation.en: My name is Joe Exotic
translation.zh: 我的名字叫乔野生

translation.en: and this is Thunder and Lightning!
translation.zh: 这是雷击和闪电！

translation.en: The only difference between my pet and your pet is
translation.zh: 我的宠物和你们的宠物的唯一区别是

translation.en: mine have three-inch teeth, and they weigh 400 pounds.
translation.zh: 我的宠物 牙齿有8厘米长重达180公斤

translation.en: Does it feel good to stand on my stage
translation.zh: 跟约230公斤重的老虎站在舞台上

translation.en: with 500-pound tigers and everybody envy you?
translation.zh: 大家都羡慕你 这种感觉好吗？

translation.en: Absolutely. Okay?
translation.zh: 当然好了 好吗？

translation.en: I would be the biggest liar if I said no.
translation.zh: 如果我说不好 那我就是大骗子了

translation.en: Now, stop.
translation.zh: 停下啦

translation.en: That's a brand-new shirt, now quit it!
translation.zh: 这是新衣服 别咬了！

translation.en: Do you have a sense of bonding with them, or do you have a-- Ooh.
translation.zh: 你和它们有亲密感吗 还是你会…

translation.en: Is there, like an emotional connection between you and these cats?
translation.zh: 你和这些大猫之间有情感联系吗？

translation.en: There is a very emotional connection between me and these cats. Extreme.
translation.zh: 我和这些大猫间有一种特殊的情感联系

translation.en: That's his deal right now.
translation.zh: 它现在就在这么想呢

translation.en: I mean, his whole deal is about just wanting--
translation.zh: 我是说 它现在想要的…

translation.en: Petted and loved on, you know?
translation.zh: 就是让我爱抚一下 你懂吗？

translation.en: -They're so affectionate and fond-- -Are these trying to mate?
translation.zh: -它们很深情 很喜欢…-它们在交配吗？

translation.en: Well, they're two boys.
translation.zh: 它俩是雄性的

translation.en: -Oh, they're two boys. -We have a very open relationship here.
translation.zh: -它俩是雄性呀-不过我们随便它们交往的

translation.en: We do not discriminate here.
translation.zh: 我们这里不歧视任何动物

translation.en: [Joe] Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 下午好 女士们、先生们

translation.en: I'd like to welcome you to the Greater Wynnewood Exotic Animal Park.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到大温尼伍德野生动物园

translation.en: I can assure you're going to get closer to tigers and lions here
translation.zh: 我可以保证 这里比世界任何地方

translation.en: than you would anywhere in the world. Matter of fact, you're gonna get so close
translation.zh: 更能让你接近老虎狮子 事实上 我可以跟你们保证

translation.en: I can almost promise you some of you will be urinated on.
translation.zh: 距离会近到有些人会被它们尿在身上

translation.en: If that happens, we have t-shirts in the gift shop
translation.zh: 如果尿在身上了 纪念品店有衣服卖

translation.en: that says, "I got peed on by a tiger."
translation.zh: 上面写着 “我被老虎尿在身上了”

translation.en: [man] All right, everybody, what I need you guys to do
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我要你们做的

translation.en: is walk down the fence line here.
translation.zh: 就是顺着这边的围栏走

translation.en: Follow Katrina. We're gonna introduce you to your first dangerous animal.
translation.zh: 跟随卡特里娜 我们要给你们介绍第一个危险动物

translation.en: I'm kind of embarrassed to say it, but when I got here,
translation.zh: 我有点不好意思说出来但我到这里的时候

translation.en: I was on kind of the end of my ropes.
translation.zh: 我已经到了山穷水尽的地步

translation.en: I found this place on Craigslist,
translation.zh: 我是在克雷格列表上发现这里的

translation.en: and I was like, "Man! I never done this shit before!
translation.zh: 我想 “天啊 我从没做过这种工作！

translation.en: What the fuck? Let's go!"
translation.zh: 管他呢？就是干！”

translation.en: And now look at me! I'm doing tiger shows!
translation.zh: 现在看看我！我在做老虎表演！

translation.en: [man 2] I've been the manager at the G.W. Zoo for 14 years now.
translation.zh: 我在格韦动物园当了14年的经理

translation.en: Most of the staff was unique.
translation.zh: 大多数员工都很特殊

translation.en: That's what I thought was really cool about the zoo.
translation.zh: 我认为这就是动物园很酷的地方 （约翰·伦基 格韦动物园经理）

translation.en: And then there's Joe.
translation.zh: 然后还有乔

translation.en: Do the dance! [humming]
translation.zh: 来跳舞呀！

translation.en: I love you so much!
translation.zh: 我好爱你！

translation.en: [man 3] The people who worked for Joe were misfits,
translation.zh: 为乔工作的人都是些不合群的人

translation.en: and they were a family.
translation.zh: 他们是一家人

translation.en: It was a place where all these misfits could come together
translation.zh: 这是一个让异类聚在一起的地方

translation.en: and be with the King of Misfits, who reigned over them.
translation.zh: 还有一位异类之王 统治着他们 （里克·科卡姆乔野生电视台制作人）

translation.en: [man] Joe is an entertainer by nature.
translation.zh: 乔天生就是一个艺人

translation.en: [Joe] No. Come on.
translation.zh: 不要 过来

translation.en: He was pretty much the star of his own show.
translation.zh: 他就是自己节目的明星

translation.en: I'm going to try and get some good shots.
translation.zh: 我要试着去拍一些好照片

translation.en: So make sure y'all get me some promo pictures in there.
translation.zh: 一定要给我拍一些宣传照

translation.en: [man] Want me to go up?
translation.zh: 你是否需要我…

translation.en: No, I want you up front with a still camera.
translation.zh: 不用 你拿着照相机站在前面

translation.en: Meeting him in person definitely solidified that.
translation.zh: 跟他见面以后 我更加坚信了

translation.en: ♪ Woke up this morning With the sunshine in my eyes ♪
translation.zh: （乡村音乐歌手 乔野生） 今天早上醒来 阳光照在我的眼睛

translation.en: ♪ It's funny how a smile can change The words you want to say ♪
translation.zh: 微笑可以改变你想说的话 这很有趣

translation.en: [Saffery] For Joe, the zoo was his stage.
translation.zh: 对乔来说 动物园就是他的舞台

translation.en: It was the one place he could shine.
translation.zh: 在那里 他可以闪耀

translation.en: He could control every aspect of it.
translation.zh: 可以全面掌控

translation.en: From the start of the day to the end of the day, he filmed everything.
translation.zh: 从早到晚 他可以拍摄记录一切

translation.en: Come here, love me! Come here, love me!
translation.zh: 过来 要爱我哦！

translation.en: [Saffery] He had this live TV show that he would do for a number of his followers.
translation.zh: 他有一档直播电视节目向一定数量的关注者播出

translation.en: Hello, ladies and gentlemen and welcome to JoeExoticTV.com.
translation.zh: 你们好 女士们、先生们欢迎收看乔野生电视台

translation.en: [Goode] Where does your TV show air?
translation.zh: 你的电视节目在哪里播映？

translation.en: On the internet. Worldwide. Every night at six o'clock.
translation.zh: 在互联网 全球播放 每晚六点

translation.en: Pretty cool. Come on in.
translation.zh: 很好 快进来吧

translation.en: [Kirkham] Joe had been doing these internet broadcasts,
translation.zh: 乔一直在做网络直播

translation.en: either on a regular basis or periodically,
translation.zh: 定期或不定期地

translation.en: for probably a decade or longer before I got there.
translation.zh: 在我去之前 就已经播出十年多了

translation.en: [man] Didn't Johnny Carson used to smoke on the set of the Tonight Show?
translation.zh: 约翰·尼卡森也在《今夜秀》片场吸烟吧？

translation.en: [Joe] Yeah, years ago!
translation.zh: 是啊 多年以前！

translation.en: He never had more than 80 people watching the thing live.
translation.zh: 在线看直播的人数从来没超过80人

translation.en: See ya Monday night, right here!
translation.zh: 周一晚上 我们再见！

translation.en: When I walked in, I had all this experience.
translation.zh: 我到那以后 我有这种经验

translation.en: I had a national reputation.
translation.zh: 我在全国享有声誉

translation.en: If you watch us often, you know one of our reporters, Rick Kirkham, is nuts.
translation.zh: 如果您经常收看肯定知道我们的一名记者 里克·科卡姆就是一个疯子

translation.en: [man] With a mere touch of a flame, it was instant Kirkham kabob.
translation.zh: 只要一碰火焰就瞬间变身科卡姆烤肉了

translation.en: [Kirkham] Hey, Mike, get the charcoal!
translation.zh: 迈克 不用加木炭了！

translation.en: You know, I've done a lot of shit in my life,
translation.zh: 你知道 我这辈子做过很多扯淡的事

translation.en: but I've never experienced anything like Joe Exotic.
translation.zh: 但我从来没有遇到过乔野生这样的

translation.en: He knew that I could make him famous.
translation.zh: 他知道 我可以让他出名

translation.en: I took it to a new level because I made it look like a real TV show.
translation.zh: 我让节目提升了一个水平我把节目做得像是正经的真人秀了

translation.en: [Reinke] We did a show every night.
translation.zh: 我们每晚录制节目

translation.en: and I want to say nine out of ten shows
translation.zh: （林克 动物公园经理） 我想说 十分之九的节目

translation.en: was about the animal rights people and Carole down in Florida.
translation.zh: 都是关于动物权益保护者和佛罗里达州的卡罗

translation.en: One thing you're forgetting out there, you animal rights people,
translation.zh: 你们忘记一件事 动物权益保护者们

translation.en: and especially Carole Baskin--
translation.zh: 尤其是卡罗·巴斯金

translation.en: And that's Carole Baskin down at Big Cat Rescue.
translation.zh: 就是大猫救援会的卡罗·巴斯金

translation.en: It was all part of Carole Baskin's plan when--
translation.zh: 这都属于卡罗·巴斯金的计划…

translation.en: ...paid it to Carole Baskin.
translation.zh: 钱付给了卡罗·巴斯金

translation.en: Carole Baskin is so influential.
translation.zh: 卡罗·巴斯金太有影响力了

translation.en: That Carole Baskin--
translation.zh: 卡罗·巴斯金…

translation.en: And Carole Baskin...
translation.zh: 以及卡罗·巴斯金…

translation.en: Man, if he ever had an enemy in his life, it was Carole Baskin.
translation.zh: 如果要说他的人生宿敌那就是卡罗·巴斯金

translation.en: Hi, I'm Carole Baskin and I'm the founder and CEO of Big Cat Rescue.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是卡罗·巴斯金大猫救援会的创始人和首席执行官

translation.en: We're the world's largest accredited sanctuary
translation.zh: 我们是世界上最大的认证收容所

translation.en: that is devoted entirely to caring for big cats.
translation.zh: 致力于照顾大型猫科动物

translation.en: [Joe] Since 2006,
translation.zh: 自从2006年

translation.en: we've been in this pissing match over tigers.
translation.zh: 我们一直因为老虎而进行徒劳的竞争

translation.en: If there's one thing I know for sure
translation.zh: 有一件事 是我能够确定的

translation.en: it's that big cats don't belong in cages.
translation.zh: 那就是大猫不应该住在笼子里

translation.en: I kept to myself. I did my own thing.
translation.zh: 我独来独往 我做我自己的事

translation.en: And I picked up an Oklahoma newspaper one day
translation.zh: 有一天我看到一份俄克拉荷马州的报纸

translation.en: and here's this story about this trashy little roadside zoo.
translation.zh: 上面有一段关于一个路边小动物园的故事

translation.en: And it was me!
translation.zh: 写的就是我！

translation.en: [Joe] Her whole plan is to get her following to believe
translation.zh: 她的计划就是让她的追随者相信

translation.en: that we're abusing tigers and running us all out of business.
translation.zh: 我们在虐待老虎 把我们搞破产

translation.en: [GPS] Your destination is ahead on the right.
translation.zh: 目的地就在右前方

translation.en: [woman] Here comes Carole.
translation.zh: 卡罗来了

translation.en: [Goode] Oh, she's dressed perfectly.
translation.zh: 她穿得真漂亮

translation.en: More like this?
translation.zh: 这样吗？

translation.en: You want me to get down, so you've got this cat?
translation.zh: 要我蹲下吗？这样能拍到大猫

translation.en: [Goode] Yeah, that's great, thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 这样很好 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, go ahead.
translation.zh: 好的 开始吧

translation.en: This is Joseph the lion, and he came from a facility in Ohio...
translation.zh: 这是狮子约瑟夫来自俄亥俄州的一家机构…

translation.en: I really believe in life that you can only be good at one thing.
translation.zh: 我相信在一生中 只能做好一件事

translation.en: He's gonna get nasty with me. [laughs]
translation.zh: 它会对我发脾气的

translation.en: With saving the cats,
translation.zh: 拯救大猫这件事

translation.en: it's one thing that I can fix if I can just stay focused on that.
translation.zh: 如果我能专注去做 我就能做出改变

translation.en: So I don't read the newspaper,
translation.zh: 所以我不看报纸

translation.en: I don't watch news on television unless there's a cat involved.
translation.zh: 我不看电视新闻 除非是关于大猫的

translation.en: [Goode] Where are we headed?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪里？

translation.en: [Carole] We're headed to Cameron and Zaboo.
translation.zh: 我们要去看卡梅隆和扎布

translation.en: She's saving the very best part for last 'cause they love the turkey necks.
translation.zh: 她把最好的部分留到最后因为它们喜欢火鸡脖子

translation.en: This is Bengali, an old circus tiger.
translation.zh: 这是孟加拉 以前是马戏团老虎

translation.en: You can see how they go from being so sweet
translation.zh: 你可以看到 它们可以从可爱的样子

translation.en: to just wanting to tear your face off, and they could do it like that,
translation.zh: 变成想要撕掉你的脸它们能够做到的

translation.en: and it's like, "Oh! That's amazing to have that kind of range
translation.zh: 然后还会说“能有这样的能力和速度

translation.en: and that speed!"
translation.zh: 真是太棒了！”

translation.en: I live, eat, and breathe ending the captivity of wild cats.
translation.zh: 我生活、吃饭、呼吸都是为了结束对野生大猫的囚禁

translation.en: And I know that I'm gonna see this through to the end.
translation.zh: 我知道我会坚持到最后的

translation.en: What really sets apart Big Cat Rescue from a zoo
translation.zh: 大猫救援会和动物园的区别在于

translation.en: is that we are fixing the problem,
translation.zh: 我们是解决问题

translation.en: they are creating the problem.
translation.zh: 而不是造成问题

translation.en: People like Joe Exotic,
translation.zh: 人们都喜欢乔野生

translation.en: what they are doing is breeding cats for life in cages.
translation.zh: 他们用笼子圈养大猫

translation.en: A tiger needs 400 square miles of territory in the wild.
translation.zh: 一只老虎需要约1040平方公里的领地

translation.en: So there's no cage that's going to be sufficient.
translation.zh: 笼子根本是不够的

translation.en: But the reason that we have cats in cages
translation.zh: 但我们把大猫关在笼子里

translation.en: is to provide them a safe place to live until they die.
translation.zh: 是为了给它们提供一个安全的地方直到它们死去

translation.en: This was our oldest cat.
translation.zh: 这是我们最老的大猫

translation.en: Black Mamba was a jaguar, Oakie was an ocelot,
translation.zh: 黑曼巴是美洲虎 奥基是豹猫

translation.en: Champlaine was a Canada lynx.
translation.zh: 山普伦是一只加拿大猞猁

translation.en: You're following me again. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你又在跟着我了

translation.en: You wanna lead?
translation.zh: 你要走前面吗？

translation.en: You can read plaques too.
translation.zh: 你也可以来读这些墓碑

translation.en: I think it would be fair to say that Carole is the Mother Teresa of cats.
translation.zh: 我认为卡罗就是大猫的特蕾莎修女

translation.en: You're so wonderful.
translation.zh: 你真好

translation.en: The very first image that my parents had of me in the cradle,
translation.zh: 第一张我父母抱着我的照片

translation.en: it was me and the cat.
translation.zh: 就是我和猫在一起

translation.en: I'd never been a person that had friends,
translation.zh: 我一直都没什么朋友

translation.en: and so my friends were two imaginary white cats.
translation.zh: 所以我的朋友是两只想象中的白猫

translation.en: I've always had cats in my life,
translation.zh: 我的生活中一直都有猫的存在

translation.en: and I've always felt a certain affinity toward them.
translation.zh: 我对它们有种亲切感

translation.en: I'm actually allergic to cats,
translation.zh: 其实我对猫过敏

translation.en: so my entire house is like, you know, tile floors, no curtains,
translation.zh: 所以我的房子都是瓷砖地 没有窗帘

translation.en: metal furniture, that sort of thing.
translation.zh: 都是金属家具之类的东西

translation.en: [Goode] Carole, tell me about this room, 'cause everything has a certain pattern.
translation.zh: 卡罗 跟我说说这间屋子吧所有东西都有花纹呢

translation.en: That is cat print.
translation.zh: 那是猫科动物斑纹

translation.en: -[Goode] And this? -[Carole] That was a gift.
translation.zh: -这个呢？-这是别人送的

translation.en: -And this? And-- -This I actually had painted.
translation.zh: -这个呢？-这是我画的

translation.en: [Carole] Most of what I wear are cat prints.
translation.zh: 我的大多数衣服都是猫科动物斑纹的

translation.en: It's almost a uniform.
translation.zh: 几乎是我的制服

translation.en: When I go in to talk with a legislator,
translation.zh: 当我去跟议员谈话时

translation.en: if I go in there dressed head to toe in cat prints,
translation.zh: 如果我从头到脚都穿着猫科动物斑纹

translation.en: people remember, "Oh, that's the person that's gonna be all over my case
translation.zh: 人们会记得“就是这个人要一直跟我讲述

translation.en: about why cats need to be protected."
translation.zh: 为什么要保护大猫”

translation.en: [Goode] Carole, you even have cat luggage!
translation.zh: 卡罗 你的行李箱也是猫科动物斑纹的

translation.en: It's always easy to find my luggage when I get off the plane.
translation.zh: 下飞机以后 找行李非常容易

translation.en: I think it's a great look.
translation.zh: 我觉得挺好看的

translation.en: And this is the Tiger King gift shop, where I have all of my stuff.
translation.zh: 这是虎王礼品店 各种东西都在这里

translation.en: We got honey, we got barbecue sauce,
translation.zh: 有蜂蜜、烧烤酱

translation.en: we have steak sauce, skin cream.
translation.zh: 牛排酱、护肤霜

translation.en: -I have sex gel for you and her! -Sex gel?
translation.zh: -还有情趣润滑液-情趣润滑液？

translation.en: The best seller out of this gift shop is actually Tiger King underwear line.
translation.zh: 礼品店最畅销的其实是虎王内衣系列

translation.en: People just go crazy over 'em because they're all in animal print.
translation.zh: 人们都超喜欢的 因为都是动物花纹

translation.en: -Do you wear these yourself? -I don't wear underwear.
translation.zh: -你自己也穿吗？-我不穿内衣

translation.en: You don't wear underwear?
translation.zh: 你不穿内衣吗？

translation.en: No, freeball it.
translation.zh: 是啊 无拘无束

translation.en: Oh. Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: I've been the cover of Hollywood Magazine twice.
translation.zh: 我上过两次《好莱坞杂志》的封面

translation.en: I have my first two albums that I did.
translation.zh: 这是我的前两张专辑

translation.en: This is my first album, I Saw A Tiger,
translation.zh: 第一张专辑《我看到一只老虎》

translation.en: and this is my second album, Starstruck.
translation.zh: 第二张专辑《追星族》

translation.en: And there's 28 songs and 16 music videos.
translation.zh: 有28首歌和16段音乐视频

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I saw tiger Now I understand ♪
translation.zh: 我看到老虎了 我现在明白了

translation.en: ♪ I saw tiger And the tiger saw man ♪
translation.zh: 我看到老虎了 老虎看到我了

translation.en: ♪ I tell all the hunters To lay down their guns ♪
translation.zh: 我告诉所有猎手 放下手中的猎枪

translation.en: When I first met Joe, I was like a month out of high school.
translation.zh: 第一次见到乔时我高中毕业一个月了

translation.en: I was with Joe from 2003 to 2014,
translation.zh: 从2003年到2014年 我都跟乔在一起

translation.en: so 11 years.
translation.zh: 一共11年

translation.en: He showed me love
translation.zh: 他很爱我

translation.en: and I learned how big my heart was.
translation.zh: 我也懂得了自己的心胸有多么宽阔

translation.en: And how much to care.
translation.zh: 以及如何去关爱别人

translation.en: Are you gettin' this?
translation.zh: 你录下来了吗？

translation.en: Three, two, one.
translation.zh: 三、二、一

translation.en: John's a strong, silent type.
translation.zh: 约翰是一个坚强沉默的人

translation.en: A man of few words.
translation.zh: 他的话不多

translation.en: But what a hunk.
translation.zh: 不过是一个大块头

translation.en: [Joe] At the age of 13, I knew I was gay.
translation.zh: 13岁时 我知道我是同性恋

translation.en: And I had a bad time struggling with it.
translation.zh: 当时也是特别煎熬

translation.en: When my father found out,
translation.zh: 我爸爸发现时

translation.en: he made me shake his hand in front of my mom
translation.zh: 他让我在妈妈面前跟他握手

translation.en: and promise not to come to his funeral.
translation.zh: 跟他保证 我不会参加他的葬礼

translation.en: So, I had a real issue dealing with that,
translation.zh: 所以面对这件事 我很难接受

translation.en: and one night I drove my car off a bridge.
translation.zh: 有一天晚上 我开车坠桥了

translation.en: I broke my back...
translation.zh: 我把后背摔伤了

translation.en: and spent five years in braces.
translation.zh: 带了五年支架

translation.en: I went to Florida to do my therapy...
translation.zh: 我去佛罗里达接受治疗

translation.en: and my neighbor was the manager of Lion Country Safari.
translation.zh: 我的邻居是狮子王国游猎园的经理

translation.en: And he brought home all the baby lions and baby monkeys
translation.zh: 他把小狮子和小猴子都带回家

translation.en: and stuff at night to bottle feed.
translation.zh: 晚上用奶瓶喂它们

translation.en: And that's where my attraction to exotic animals really started in.
translation.zh: 就在那里我开始对野生动物感兴趣了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I know that they have a heart and a soul and a mind.
translation.zh: 我知道它们有心灵、灵魂和思想

translation.en: I've learned from them, and they do therapy for me.
translation.zh: 我向它们学习 它们为我治疗

translation.en: Let's see your foot, sexy lion!
translation.zh: 让我看看你的脚 性感的狮子！

translation.en: But the animal rights people,
translation.zh: 但动物权益保护者们

translation.en: they keep sayin' I can't have these tigers.
translation.zh: 总是说我不能养这些老虎

translation.en: [man] There's a war in America that's being fought
translation.zh: 美国正在进行一场战争

translation.en: for an enormous amount of money.
translation.zh: 要争夺一大笔钱

translation.en: The animal rights activists,
translation.zh: 动物权益保护者们

translation.en: they want the lion's share,
translation.zh: 他们想要分一杯羹

translation.en: and they don't want to share their lions.
translation.zh: 但是却不喜欢跟别人分享

translation.en: [Howard] In addition to Joe,
translation.zh: 除了乔以外

translation.en: the most notorious...
translation.zh: 最臭名昭著的

translation.en: cub breeder/petting operation
translation.zh: 繁殖和饲养幼崽的人

translation.en: is Doc Antle.
translation.zh: 就是安特尔博士

translation.en: Antle is much more sophisticated, much smarter.
translation.zh: 安特尔更世故、更聪明

translation.en: He's fearless.
translation.zh: 他什么都不怕

translation.en: [Antle] Fifty acres makes up the preserve here.
translation.zh: 这片保护区约有300亩

translation.en: We're gonna film, you know-- this is my crib here.
translation.zh: 我们要在这里拍摄 这是我的房子

translation.en: Go to the front door and I'll go open it and say, "Hi. How you doing? Come in."
translation.zh: 你应该到前门去 我去开门 然后说：“你好呀 进来吧”

translation.en: -Good idea. -Okay?
translation.zh: -好 好主意-好吗？

translation.en: [Goode] I like that Doc is better at directing than we are.
translation.zh: 太好了 安特尔博士比我们更会执导

translation.en: -Hey. -How you doing, guys?
translation.zh: -嗨-你们好吗？

translation.en: Hi, it's Eric Goode. How are you?
translation.zh: 嗨 我是埃里克·古德 你好吗？

translation.en: -Doing good. Come on in. -Good to see you. Thanks.
translation.zh: -挺好的 进来吧-幸会 谢谢

translation.en: This is Swami Satchidananda,
translation.zh: 这是沙吉难陀大师

translation.en: my grandfather guru who--
translation.zh: 也就是我的祖父…

translation.en: A guy I lived with since I was a teenager.
translation.zh: 我从小就跟他住在一起

translation.en: All right, so I am Dr. Bhagavan Antle.
translation.zh: 好的 我是博伽梵·安特尔博士

translation.en: B-h-a-g-a-v-a-n. Antle, A-n-t-l-e. Dr. Bhagavan Antle.
translation.zh: 博-伽-梵-安-特-尔博伽梵·安特尔博士

translation.en: I am the director of the Myrtle Beach Safari
translation.zh: 我是默特尔比奇游猎园的主管

translation.en: and the rare species fund.
translation.zh: 还负责稀有物种基金

translation.en: And speaking of incredible animals,
translation.zh: 说到不可思议的动物

translation.en: joining us is the founder and director of TIGERS.
translation.zh: 正在走来的就是老虎动物园的创始人和主管

translation.en: -[applause] -Good afternoon, guys!
translation.zh: 各位 下午好！

translation.en: This is my little girl, Bubbles!
translation.zh: 这是我的小宝贝 泡泡！

translation.en: Look at the pictures there.
translation.zh: 请看这张照片

translation.en: That really is Bubbles and I as kids together.
translation.zh: 这是我和泡泡小时候在一起的时候

translation.en: You can see somehow both of us got way bigger over the years.
translation.zh: 可以看到 这几年来 我们都长大很多

translation.en: I have been building this incredible preserve
translation.zh: 我一直在建造这片不可思议的保护区

translation.en: for people to have an interactive, up-close,
translation.zh: 让人们可以近距离互动

translation.en: uncaged experience with wildlife.
translation.zh: 没有关在笼子里的野生动物

translation.en: Now these big teeth also make it
translation.zh: 这些巨大的牙齿

translation.en: so that he can take down larger prey than you would expect.
translation.zh: 让它可以捕获比你想象中更大的猎物

translation.en: And he thinks coming out here is a wee bit of a drag.
translation.zh: 但他觉得 出来这里就有点费劲了

translation.en: [Antle] To see an animal going to chase that high-speed lure,
translation.zh: 看到动物追逐高速的诱饵

translation.en: diving into that crystal-clear pool...
translation.zh: 潜入清澈的水池…

translation.en: [woman] Look at the camera!
translation.zh: 看镜头！

translation.en: [Antle] People become wildly stimulated
translation.zh: 人们会感到极度亢奋

translation.en: at seeing that amazing stuff up close and uncaged.
translation.zh: 近距离看到这些神奇的动物在笼子外面

translation.en: I am popular,
translation.zh: 我非常受欢迎

translation.en: I am so well known as big cat guy around the world,
translation.zh: 我是世界最有名的大猫专家

translation.en: that people who are against people having relationships with animals, period,
translation.zh: 那些反对人们与动物有亲密关系的人 想要毁灭我 因为我在最前线

translation.en: want to destroy me because I am out there in the forefront
translation.zh: 想要毁灭我 因为我在最前线

translation.en: so known of being this guy that is in love with big cats
translation.zh: 大家都知道 我喜欢大猫

translation.en: and has them love him back.
translation.zh: 大猫们也喜欢我

translation.en: [Reinke] Joe wanted to be so much like Doc Antle,
translation.zh: 乔想跟安特尔博士一样

translation.en: he sent several of us up there to see his facilities,
translation.zh: 他派许多人去看他的动物园

translation.en: so we can do the same in his place.
translation.zh: 想在自己的动物园做同样的事

translation.en: [Joe] He's taught me quite a bit
translation.zh: 他教了我不少东西

translation.en: as far as being able to market the zoo and make money at the zoo.
translation.zh: 包括营销动物园 帮助动物园盈利

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my god, here are the cubs!
translation.zh: 天啊 都是幼崽呀！

translation.en: All right, so, we're gonna make sure everybody standing up
translation.zh: 好了 我们会让每个人都站起来

translation.en: gets your turn to come down here and love on this baby tiger
translation.zh: 轮流过来 爱抚老虎宝宝

translation.en: 'cause that's what you came here for.
translation.zh: 因为这就是你们来这里的目的

translation.en: The animal rights people like to bitch at you
translation.zh: 动物权益保护者会抱怨

translation.en: that cub petting is abuse, okay.
translation.zh: 说爱抚幼崽是虐待 好吧

translation.en: In my opinion, it's the best education tool.
translation.zh: 在我看来 这是最好的教育工具

translation.en: And keep in mind, in the rain forest, there's no escalators. All right?
translation.zh: 要记住 雨林里是没有自动扶梯的 好吗？

translation.en: You know, people only care about saving what affects them.
translation.zh: 你知道 人们只关心影响他们的东西

translation.en: So you set a baby tiger in a family's lap
translation.zh: 所以你把一只小老虎放在游客腿上

translation.en: and they fall in love with this baby tiger,
translation.zh: 他们爱上了这只小老虎

translation.en: and you have 15 minutes of their undivided attention to say,
translation.zh: 你就有15分钟的时间让他们专心致志地听你说

translation.en: "Look, we gotta save the rain forest
translation.zh: “听着 我们要保护雨林

translation.en: because you're killing this little baby tiger's...
translation.zh: 不然就会害死这些小老虎…

translation.en: you know, where he came from."
translation.zh: 因为那是它们的家”

translation.en: They leave with a whole different attitude.
translation.zh: 人们离开时 就会有完全不同的态度

translation.en: [Antle] We believe these incredible, up-close experiences
translation.zh: 我们相信这些不可思议的近距离体验

translation.en: makes a connection between them and the wild world,
translation.zh: 能让人们与野生世界建立联系

translation.en: opening their hearts and their wallets,
translation.zh: 让人们敞开心扉 打开钱包

translation.en: for us to do our worldwide conservation work.
translation.zh: 让我们在全球范围内开展保护工作

translation.en: [Goode] What is the cost of admission here?
translation.zh: 这里的门票是多少钱？

translation.en: Three-thirty-nine is the start price, right?
translation.zh: 起步价是339美元 对吧？

translation.en: There's people that paid 625, 655 for their tours today.
translation.zh: 但今天有人花了625美元或655美元的门票钱

translation.en: 'Cause it's dynamic price like an airline ticket.
translation.zh: 门票价格是浮动的 就像机票一样

translation.en: The price goes up according to how many people are coming on.
translation.zh: 参观人数增加 门票价格也会上涨

translation.en: This is our third time. Second this week.
translation.zh: 这是我们第三次来 这周第二次了

translation.en: Me and my wife were here Sunday.
translation.zh: 我和妻子周日就来过了

translation.en: [man] You can't put a price on holding a baby tiger.
translation.zh: 抱着老虎的体验是无价的

translation.en: -That's his favorite animal. -I mean, I hit the lottery,
translation.zh: -他最喜欢老虎了-如果我中彩票了

translation.en: I'll pay these people whatever they want
translation.zh: 他们门票收多少钱 我都会付款

translation.en: for me to go down to the reservation every day and play with them.
translation.zh: 我愿意每天去保护区跟老虎玩

translation.en: [Antle] We charge a premium because it costs so much
translation.zh: 我们收取额外费用 因为照顾老虎

translation.en: to do proper care.
translation.zh: 要花很多钱

translation.en: We feed super quality food
translation.zh: 我们投喂的食物都是高品质的

translation.en: that anyone would be glad to eat themselves.
translation.zh: 人们自己都会想吃的

translation.en: It's a minimum of $10,000 a year to feed each tiger.
translation.zh: 喂养每只老虎 每年要花至少一万元

translation.en: [Joe] I can feed a tiger for $3,000 a year.
translation.zh: 喂养一只老虎 每年要花3000块钱

translation.en: [Goode] You've got how many tigers now?
translation.zh: 你现在一共有多少老虎？

translation.en: I have 227.
So you're spending...
translation.zh: 所以饲养费用

translation.en: three quarters of a million feeding your tigers?
translation.zh: 就要花掉75万美元吗？

translation.en: [Joe] Just feeding 'em.
translation.zh: 只是饲养费用

translation.en: [Joe] We work our ass off in order to drop that price.
translation.zh: 我们费尽心血 去降低价格

translation.en: We have feed lots that give us five to seven cows a day...
translation.zh: 我们找了饲养场 每天提供5至7头牛

translation.en: that die in the feed lots.
translation.zh: 都是在饲养场死去的

translation.en: The game wardens and the highway patrol call us any time
translation.zh: 发现有牛或鹿在高速公路上被撞死

translation.en: that a cow or a deer gets hit on the highway.
translation.zh: 狩猎管理员和公路巡警就会通知我们

translation.en: If I was to feed nothing but cows,
translation.zh: 如果只喂牛肉的话

translation.en: I would need 30 cows a day.
translation.zh: 我每天需要30头牛

translation.en: ♪ I'm a baby tiger Short and stout ♪
translation.zh: 我是一只虎宝宝 又矮又壮

translation.en: ♪ This is my tail And this is my mouth ♪
translation.zh: 这是我的尾巴 这是我的嘴巴

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna bite you And it's gonna hurt ♪
translation.zh: 我要咬你了 会很疼的哟

translation.en: ♪ So why will I bite you? Because I'm a jerk ♪
translation.zh: 为什么要咬你？因为我很傻

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 唱完了

translation.en: [Joe] This was actually me and my brother's dream, you know.
translation.zh: 其实这是我和我哥哥的梦想

translation.en: he was moving my sister from Dallas to Florida
translation.zh: 他和嫂子要从达拉斯搬到佛罗里达

translation.en: and he made it 40 miles.
translation.zh: 他刚开出来64公里

translation.en: And a drunk semi driver hit him.
translation.zh: 就被一辆酒后驾驶的卡车撞到了

translation.en: -Who's this? -My brother.
translation.zh: -这是谁？-我哥哥

translation.en: -That's the one that-- -Yup. Yep.
translation.zh: -就是他…-是啊

translation.en: So, when I signed the papers to shut his life support machine off
translation.zh: 所以当我签字同意关掉生命维持系统

translation.en: and donate his organs,
translation.zh: 并捐献器官时

translation.en: I promised him that he would just not be a statistic...
translation.zh: 我向他保证他不会只是一个统计数字

translation.en: that the people of the world would know who he is.
translation.zh: 全世界的人都会知道他是谁

translation.en: And that's when the GW Exotic Animal Foundation was born, in his memory.
translation.zh: 格韦野生动物基金会就是那时诞生的为了纪念他

translation.en: My brother, he's an angel now.
translation.zh: 我的哥哥 他已经是天使了

translation.en: I went to schools and I talked to them about drugs and alcohol.
translation.zh: 我去学校 跟孩子们讲述毒品和酒精

translation.en: But I couldn't keep their attention, okay?
translation.zh: 但是没人听我的

translation.en: So I took animals.
translation.zh: 所以我就带着动物去

translation.en: What do we say to drugs?
translation.zh: 我们要对毒品说什么？

translation.en: We say no to drugs, that's right.
translation.zh: 我们要对毒品说“不” 没错

translation.en: Because drugs will make your teeth fall out,
translation.zh: 因为毒品会让你的牙齿都掉光

translation.en: and you get really ugly and you don't have any friends.
translation.zh: 你会变得很丑 没人愿意跟你做朋友

translation.en: Animals just wasn't enough, okay?
translation.zh: 只有动物还不够 好吗？

translation.en: So then I started adding magic.
translation.zh: 所以我开始加入魔术

translation.en: [Finlay] He'd put on a magic show, which actually was pretty cool.
translation.zh: 他表演魔术 还挺酷的

translation.en: He would use animals in it.
translation.zh: 他会加入动物元素

translation.en: He had a 12-year-old kid kind of showing him how to do stuff.
translation.zh: 他有一个12岁的孩子 教他做各种事

translation.en: [man] I first met Joe when I was in the eighth grade.
translation.zh: 我上八年级时 第一次认识乔的

translation.en: I helped in a show down in Norman, Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 在俄克拉荷马诺曼的演出中我负责帮忙

translation.en: Joe wasn't doing magic.
translation.zh: 乔不会变魔术

translation.en: I started showing him some of the magic that I did.
translation.zh: 所以我开始教他魔术

translation.en: And Joe supplied tigers to be used during the show.
translation.zh: 乔会提供老虎 配合表演

translation.en: We're talking this morning about the upcoming
translation.zh: 我们今天早上要讨论即将上演的

translation.en: Mystical Magic of the Endangered Show.
translation.zh: 关于濒危物种的神秘魔术

translation.en: It's coming to the Valley View Mall.
translation.zh: 演出将在山谷景观商场进行

translation.en: That's when he decided to change his name to Joe Exotic.
translation.zh: 就在那时 他决定改名叫乔野生

translation.en: My real name is Joe Schreibvogel.
translation.zh: 我的真名叫乔·史若布沃格尔

translation.en: I go by Joe Exotic
translation.zh: 后来改叫乔野生

translation.en: 'cause nobody ever knows how to say it right anyway.
translation.zh: 因为没人知道那名字应该怎么读

translation.en: When we first started out, we were all crammed in a semi.
translation.zh: 刚开始时 我们都挤在一辆半拖车里

translation.en: Fourteen of us in a cab of a semi, that's a little cramped.
translation.zh: 14个人坐在一辆半挂车里 有点拥挤

translation.en: Today we have a Siberian Tiger, an Indochinese Tiger,
translation.zh: 今天我们有西伯利亚虎、印度虎

translation.en: a two-toed sloth, a black panther...
translation.zh: 二趾树懒和一只黑豹…

translation.en: Joe was taking tiger cubs, stick 'em in a semi,
translation.zh: 乔带着小老虎 把它们放到半挂车里

translation.en: and carting them to malls all throughout the Midwest.
translation.zh: 然后运到中西部的各个商场

translation.en: [Finlay] They would do cub petting.
translation.zh: 然后让大家爱抚幼崽

translation.en: You could take your picture with this little baby cub.
translation.zh: 可以跟幼崽一起照相

translation.en: Look at me! Awesome.
translation.zh: 看着我！太棒了

translation.en: I mean, there was times that we may have made ten grand
translation.zh: 我是说 有时候 我们在商场里

translation.en: at the mall.
translation.zh: 能赚到一万块

translation.en: And there was times that we were doing 20, 30, 40 grand.
translation.zh: 有时候能赚到两万、三万、四万

translation.en: Howard and Carole hired me at the beginning of 2011
translation.zh: 霍华德和卡罗在2011年初雇我的

translation.en: to basically try to track Joe
translation.zh: 基本就是跟着乔

translation.en: and convince the malls to not allow him to exploit cubs.
translation.zh: 说服商场不允许他虐待幼崽

translation.en: We started a program where we would contact the malls
translation.zh: 我们开始了一个项目 联系商场

translation.en: and explain to them why this was bad.
translation.zh: 跟他们解释这样做为什么不好

translation.en: [Bass] At one point, we used someone to follow Joe
translation.zh: 有一次 我们派人跟踪乔

translation.en: and report what mall they were going to next.
translation.zh: 然后报告他们接下来要去哪个商场

translation.en: [reporter] The animals' presence isn't...
translation.zh: 但动物的出现不仅是…

translation.en: [Bass] It was, you know, part detective work to try to track down Joe
translation.zh: 这是一项侦探工作 试图跟踪乔

translation.en: and where he was in the country with these cubs.
translation.zh: 找到他带着幼崽们跑到哪里去了

translation.en: And they stalk every move you make.
translation.zh: 他们会跟踪你做出的每一步动作

translation.en: Doesn't matter where you are in the country.
translation.zh: 无论你在国内的什么地方

translation.en: They would research it, find the owners of the mall
translation.zh: 他们会做调查 找到商场老板

translation.en: and email them, text 'em, call 'em, send the media out there, everything.
translation.zh: 发邮件 发短信 打电话 派媒体过去

translation.en: Just hammer 'em.
translation.zh: 猛烈攻击他们

translation.en: [Howard] Years ago when Carole first started doing this,
translation.zh: 几年前 卡罗刚开始这样做的时候

translation.en: we might generate 500 emails...
translation.zh: 我们差不多会生成500封邮件…

translation.en: -And be proud of it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真是骄傲呢-是啊

translation.en: And as our online audience grew and our supporter base grew,
translation.zh: 随着在线观众和支持者的增加

translation.en: this gradually got up to thousands of emails.
translation.zh: 逐渐上升到数千封邮件

translation.en: Sometimes as many as five or six thousand emails.
translation.zh: 有时候能达到五、六千封

translation.en: And one by one,
translation.zh: 渐渐地

translation.en: these malls started refusing to have him back.
translation.zh: 这些商场开始拒绝他的表演了

translation.en: That would pay the bills for the winter sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时可以用来支付冬天的费用

translation.en: So it was definitely a big loss for us.
translation.zh: 对我们来说 可谓损失惨重

translation.en: But Joe always found a way to make money.
translation.zh: 不过乔总是能找到赚钱的法子

translation.en: One of the most popular adventures here
translation.zh: 在大温尼伍德野生动物园

translation.en: at the Greater Wynnewood Exotic Animal Park is a ticket for you,
translation.zh: 最受欢迎的活动之一

translation.en: and that's private playtime with a baby tiger.
translation.zh: 就是跟一只老虎宝宝单独玩耍

translation.en: [Carole] Anybody who poses with an exotic cat is a problem.
translation.zh: 无论是谁跟这些大猫合影都是一个问题

translation.en: It just drives more and more and more breeding
translation.zh: 会让越来越多的人想要饲养

translation.en: of these cats who will never live free.
translation.zh: 这些大猫就永远不能自由了

translation.en: [reporter 1] Tiger selfies, a big trend on a dating app...
translation.zh: 跟老虎合影已成为约会应用上的潮流…

translation.en: The tiger selfie is a growing trend
translation.zh: 跟老虎合影

translation.en: on sites like Tinder and OKCupid apparently.
translation.zh: 在Tinder和OKCupid这种应用上显然已经成为潮流了

translation.en: Oh yeah, this is how endangered species can save themselves,
translation.zh: 是的 濒危物种就是这样自救的

translation.en: by helping us get laid.
translation.zh: 帮助我们约到炮

translation.en: [Carole] Wild animals have been brought onto the late-night shows.
translation.zh: 野生动物被带到夜间访谈节目中

translation.en: -How do you hold these? -This way.
translation.zh: 应该怎么抱 我想抱抱看

translation.en: Hold it against your breast.
translation.zh: 抱在胸前

translation.en: [Carole] And when people see that, they want to emulate it.
translation.zh: 人们看到以后 就会想要效仿

translation.en: All right, yesterday on my day off
translation.zh: 是啊 昨天休息的时候

translation.en: I went to the G.W. Zoo.
translation.zh: 我去了格韦动物园

translation.en: Shoutout to Exotic Joe.
translation.zh: 我跟乔野生说

translation.en: I got two more tigers.
translation.zh: 我要再养两只老虎

translation.en: Now look at me, how young I am there on Letterman.
translation.zh: 快看啊我在莱特曼的节目上显得很年轻

translation.en: Man! Go back, go back!
translation.zh: 天啊！往回倒一点！

translation.en: We might as well do Letterman real quick.
translation.zh: 我们也可以录一段莱特曼的

translation.en: Here I am long ago on The Late Show with David Letterman.
translation.zh: 这是我以前参加《大卫·莱特曼深夜秀》

translation.en: I've got my big black panther there, Shadow.
translation.zh: 我带着我的黑豹去的 它叫影子

translation.en: Jay brought us out into the forefront of people,
translation.zh: 杰把我们带到了人们面前

translation.en: he got to meet my animals like no one else had ever done.
translation.zh: 他见到了我的动物这是其他人没有做过的

translation.en: The world's biggest cat coming on there,
translation.zh: 世界上最大的大猫来到那里

translation.en: baby tigers, cheetahs, leopards, everybody out there.
translation.zh: 还有小老虎、猎豹、豹 应有尽有

translation.en: Enough?
translation.zh: 可以了吗？

translation.en: Here I am in costume
translation.zh: 这是我穿着戏服

translation.en: playing Marvelous Bhagavan, the magic man.
translation.zh: 扮演魔术师薄伽梵

translation.en: And the cubs played themselves.
translation.zh: 虎宝宝本色出演

translation.en: I don't remember a time where it wasn't everything I was doing,
translation.zh: 我不记得 我做的任何事情

translation.en: having animals in my life.
translation.zh: 是没有动物参与其中的

translation.en: I grew up a professional cowboy in a family of professional cowboys.
translation.zh: 我是在一个职业牛仔的家庭里长大的

translation.en: That led me along to be able to have a quality life
translation.zh: 这让我的生活丰富多彩

translation.en: of a lot of interaction with amazing domestic and wild animals.
translation.zh: 能跟各种家养和野生动物进行互动

translation.en: I moved to Yogaville in Buckingham, Virginia.
translation.zh: 我搬到了维吉尼亚州白金汉的瑜伽村

translation.en: I started immersing myself in that life
translation.zh: 我开始沉浸在那种生活中

translation.en: and I saw the incredible power
translation.zh: 我看到了不可思议的力量

translation.en: of presenting the animals without barriers,
translation.zh: 动物没有围栏阻挡

translation.en: without caging, so that you can really get to see them
translation.zh: 没有笼子关着 可以真正去看它们

translation.en: in all of their power and glory.
translation.zh: 看到它们的力量和荣耀

translation.en: [Antle] People in Hollywood, people other places came to me and said,
translation.zh: 好莱坞和其他地方的人来找我说

translation.en: "Hey, we need a tiger to do this.
translation.zh: “嘿 我们需要一只老虎来做这事

translation.en: We would like a tiger to do that."
translation.zh: 我们需要一只老虎去做那事”

translation.en: -And ready and go. -Action.
translation.zh: -准备好了-开拍

translation.en: You are a good kitty.
translation.zh: 你真是乖猫猫

translation.en: [Antle] I made 500 gigantic international movies,
translation.zh: 我参与拍摄了500部大型国际电影

translation.en: from Ace Ventura, Jungle Book,
translation.zh: 包括《王牌威龙》、《森林王子》

translation.en: Dr. Doolittle, Mighty Joe Young...
translation.zh: 《豚鼠特工队》、《巨猩乔扬》…

translation.en: I mean, it's a huge list of features that we made.
translation.zh: 我们参演了无数的电影了

translation.en: Today we're gonna take those same techniques
translation.zh: 今天 我们将用博士

translation.en: that Doc created while working with Hollywood's top producers and directors
translation.zh: 与好莱坞顶级制片人和导演合作时

translation.en: to create for you an amazing animal adventure.
translation.zh: 创造的技术为大家带来一场神奇的动物冒险

translation.en: Have you had your photo taken?
translation.zh: 你们已经拍完照了吗？

translation.en: No? Keep coming, keep coming.
translation.zh: 没有吗？继续拍吧

translation.en: The toenails you gotta watch because they rip your face.
translation.zh: 要小心脚趾甲 以免划破你的脸

translation.en: Grandma?
translation.zh: 奶奶？

translation.en: -[patron] How old are they? -Six weeks.
translation.zh: -它们多大了？-六周

translation.en: From the time that they're four weeks old
translation.zh: 从它们四周大开始

translation.en: to the time that they're 16 weeks old,
translation.zh: 一直到它们长到16周

translation.en: you can profit $100,000 on that cub.
translation.zh: 一只幼崽能赚10万美元

translation.en: Interaction, playtimes, photos.
translation.zh: 互动、游戏、拍照

translation.en: [Carole] People who pimp out tiger cubs can only use them
translation.zh: 只有几周大的老虎宝宝

translation.en: from the time that they're a few weeks old
translation.zh: 那些养虎赚钱的人才觉得有用

translation.en: until they're about 12 weeks old,
translation.zh: 直到它们长到12周

translation.en: and when they get to be that age, they can take a finger off.
translation.zh: 等到12周以后 他们就可以脱手了

translation.en: There are enough ignorant people out there
translation.zh: 有很多无知的人

translation.en: who will then take in that tiger and a year later,
translation.zh: 他们会收养那只老虎 一年以后

translation.en: that cat's two or three hundred pounds and they're calling us saying,
translation.zh: 那只老虎长到90到140公斤左右他们打电话给我们说

translation.en: "Please get this out of my house."
translation.zh: “快把这只老虎从我家拉走吧”

translation.en: At the same time, there's almost no government regulation
translation.zh: 与此同时 几乎没有政府监管

translation.en: of private possession, which I believe
translation.zh: 私人进行饲养 在我看来

translation.en: is leading to the unbelievable number of these cats in captivity.
translation.zh: 就是这样导致了私人饲养老虎的数量如此庞大

translation.en: We have a tiger crisis in this country.
translation.zh: 我们国家有老虎危机

translation.en: [caller 1] Yeah, there's a lion on Mount Perry Road and Gratiot.
translation.zh: 是啊 派瑞山路和格雷休特有一头狮子

translation.en: [caller 2] It was heading west in a hurry.
translation.zh: 它匆忙地向西移动

translation.en: [caller 3] Looks like a jaguar or wolf or something...
translation.zh: 看起来像美洲虎或狼之类的…

translation.en: [Carole] Zanesville really woke up the public about the fact
translation.zh: 曾斯维尔真正让公众意识到这个事实

translation.en: that there could be dangerous wild animals living right next door to them
translation.zh: 他们的隔壁就可能有危险的野生动物

translation.en: and they didn't even know it.
translation.zh: 而他们自己甚至都不知道

translation.en: [man] It walked out in front of me, and it was standing there under the streetlight.
translation.zh: 它走到我前面 站在路灯下

translation.en: [reporter] Sheriff Matt Lutz said 50 wild animals kept on a private farm
translation.zh: 马特卢茨警长表示 有人故意放生了

translation.en: had been deliberately set loose.
translation.zh: 50只养在私人农场的野生动物

translation.en: One baboon, three mountain lions and 18 tigers.
translation.zh: 一只狒狒、三只美洲狮和18只老虎

translation.en: [man] Anything outside the perimeter gets... definitely gets taken down.
translation.zh: 跑出去的任何东西都肯定会被击毙

translation.en: [reporter] The animals were unleashed on the town by a man who kept them in his backyard.
translation.zh: 一个在自家后院饲养这些动物的人把它们放了 让它们到镇上自由走动

translation.en: [Carole] I believe that there are a number of ticking time bombs out there,
translation.zh: 我相信外面还很多定时炸弹

translation.en: and when those places implode and somebody does something crazy,
translation.zh: 如果有地方引爆有人做了一些疯狂的事情

translation.en: that will probably push our legislation forward.
translation.zh: 也可能会推动我们的立法

translation.en: [reporter] Forty-eight of his animals were eventually killed,
translation.zh: 48只动物最终被杀死

translation.en: pushing Ohio lawmakers to author a new bill
translation.zh: 促使俄亥俄州议员们起草一项新法案

translation.en: restricting private ownership of exotic pets.
translation.zh: 限制私人饲养野生动物

translation.en: It's not that having lions and tigers is bad unto itself.
translation.zh: 并不是说饲养狮子和老虎本身有害

translation.en: It is the way he took care of them that made it take place.
translation.zh: 而是他饲养动物的方式导致悲剧发生的

translation.en: Properly managed wildlife can become a great tool for wildlife education, like…
translation.zh: 妥善管理野生动物可以使其成为良好的教育工具 比如…

translation.en: [reporter] Arguably the loudest, most defiant voice on the front lines
translation.zh: 在大型猫科动物领域的前沿阵线中

translation.en: of the big cat debate belongs to this man.
translation.zh: 最响亮、最大胆的声音无疑来自这个人

translation.en: I'm Joe Exotic and this is Sarge.
translation.zh: 我是乔野生 这是中士

translation.en: The president of the Humane Society called this place, and I quote:
translation.zh: 保护动物协会主席称这个地方我引用一下

translation.en: "A ticking time bomb and potentially ten times worse than Zanesville."
translation.zh: 是一颗定时炸弹可能比曾斯维尔还要糟糕十倍

translation.en: It is a ticking time bomb if somebody thinks
translation.zh: 如果有人认为 能来把我的动物带走

translation.en: they're gonna walk in here and take my animals away.
translation.zh: 那这里就真会变成定时炸弹

translation.en: It's going to be a small Waco.
translation.zh: 变成又一次韦科惨案

translation.en: That's a pretty powerful statement.
translation.zh: 这种表述真是很强势啊

translation.en: It's a very powerful statement because I have poured my entire life
translation.zh: 就是很强势 因为我这一生

translation.en: into what I do.
translation.zh: 都在做这件事

translation.en: Nobody is gonna walk in here and freely shut me down
translation.zh: 没有人能够随便走进来 让我停止

translation.en: and take my rights away from me as long as I am not breaking the law.
translation.zh: 剥夺我的权利 只要我没有违法

translation.en: [man] You know, I've been sheriff here now for over eight years,
translation.zh: 我在这里当警长已经八年多了

translation.en: and our community gets its share of crime, drug use, burglaries, domestic assaults.
translation.zh: 我们这个社区有很多犯罪行为吸毒、入室盗窃、家庭暴力

translation.en: But then there's Joe Exotic.
translation.zh: 然后还有乔野生

translation.en: Within a year of becoming sheriff, Joe walks into my office.
translation.zh: 在我当警长不到一年的时候乔走进了我的办公室

translation.en: -Good, good. -Right here.
translation.zh: -好的-在那

translation.en: From that point on, it was, uh... it's been nonstop,
translation.zh: 从那以后 就从来没有停过

translation.en: you know, with the G.W. Zoo and Joe.
translation.zh: 就是格韦动物园和乔的事

translation.en: This is the thing you don't want when you have tigers, folks.
translation.zh: 如果你养着老虎这是你不想要的东西 伙计们

translation.en: It's a real life tornado, and there ain't nothin' you can do
translation.zh: 刮起龙卷风了 现在什么都做不了

translation.en: besides protect yourself.
translation.zh: 只能先保护好自己

translation.en: [Rhodes] I've gotten a lot of calls to-- "You better watch Joe.
translation.zh: 我接到很多电话说 “你最好盯着乔

translation.en: He's doing this, he's saying that."
translation.zh: 他在做这个 他在说那个”

translation.en: One of the things that keeps me awake at night is the park.
translation.zh: 动物园是我晚上无法入睡的原因之一

translation.en: If you're an animal rights person,
translation.zh: 如果你是动物权益保护者

translation.en: and you try and come into this facility,
translation.zh: 想要到我的动物园来

translation.en: this is what you're going to be greeted with.
translation.zh: 我就将这样欢迎你

translation.en: Joe is a very paranoid person.
translation.zh: 乔是一个非常偏执的人

translation.en: When I really realized Joe was potentially dangerous
translation.zh: 我真正意识到 乔有可能很危险

translation.en: was when he made a comment about "this could be another Waco."
translation.zh: 是他说可能会引发又一起韦科惨案

translation.en: That stand-off near Waco began as a federal raid
translation.zh: 韦科附近的对峙始于一次联邦突击搜查

translation.en: when federal agents tried to serve a search warrant.
translation.zh: 当时联邦探员试图发出搜查令

translation.en: Our hearts go out to these brave agents who died today in the line of duty.
translation.zh: 我们的心与因公殉职的英勇战士同在

translation.en: [Rhodes] And I took that as a direct threat
translation.zh: 我认为那是直接的威胁

translation.en: that if my office ever had to take some action out there,
translation.zh: 如果警察局不得不采取行动

translation.en: we were going to have a shoot-out.
translation.zh: 我们要进行一场枪战

translation.en: This is my little town.
translation.zh: 这是我的小天地

translation.en: I'm the mayor, the prosecutor, the cop, and the executioner.
translation.zh: 我是市长、检察官、警察和刽子手

translation.en: You know, after the Waco deal, me and Joe made a pact.
translation.zh: 自从韦科言论之后 我和乔说好了

translation.en: If anything went bad,
translation.zh: 如果出了什么问题

translation.en: we were gonna shoot each other.
translation.zh: 我们就互相开枪了断

translation.en: And then that day...
translation.zh: 就在那天

translation.en: I put our names on our bullets right here.
translation.zh: 我把我们的名字刻在子弹上了

translation.en: I have my name and his name on a bullet.
translation.zh: 子弹上有我和他的名字

translation.en: If anything went wrong, it was gonna happen.
translation.zh: 如果出问题 我们就这样做

translation.en: [Joe] What kinda camera guy are you?
translation.zh: 你算什么摄影师？

translation.en: [Rhodes] Someone like Joe, who is very polarizing...
translation.zh: 像乔这样的人是非常极端的

translation.en: He can draw out people to oppose him.
translation.zh: 他能鼓动人们反对他

translation.en: [Joe] Oh, fuck yeah!
translation.zh: 牛逼！

translation.en: [Rhodes] For instance, I mean,
translation.zh: 比如 我是说

translation.en: I would get a little cut-out postcard like this, addressed to me...
translation.zh: 我会收到这样剪下来的明信片寄给我的

translation.en: picture of Joe with the word evil on it.
translation.zh: 上面是乔的照片 写着“邪恶”二字

translation.en: That was really the point I realized, you know,
translation.zh: 就是这时候 我意识到

translation.en: there's people that are opposite of what Joe believes in.
translation.zh: 有些人与乔的信仰相反

translation.en: I have defended myself since 2006
translation.zh: 自2006年以来 我一直在为自己辩护

translation.en: against People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals.
translation.zh: 对抗善待动物组织

translation.en: Carole Baskin is supported by the help of PETA
translation.zh: 卡罗·巴斯金得到了善待动物组织的支持

translation.en: to the point that they've actually made me a target now.
translation.zh: 现在他们已经把我当成了目标

translation.en: [woman] PETA is unapologetic in its mission to help animals,
translation.zh: 善待动物组织对帮助动物的使命无怨无悔

translation.en: and we've been targeting Joe Exotic for many, many years.
translation.zh: 我们多年来一直把乔野生作为目标

translation.en: I think that we can't...
translation.zh: 我觉得我们不能…

translation.en: underestimate how dangerous some of these people are.
translation.zh: （布列塔尼·皮特圈养动物执法官 善待动物组织） 低估其中一些人的危险性

translation.en: [Reinke] They think that animals are being beat everywhere they go.
translation.zh: 他们认为无论动物们走到哪里 都会被打

translation.en: We didn't beat tigers at our zoo.
translation.zh: 在我们的动物园里 老虎不会挨打

translation.en: We sure got accused of it.
translation.zh: 有人指控我们做了这种事

translation.en: Those people are fucking insane, man.
translation.zh: 那些人简直疯了

translation.en: Actually, they scare me.
translation.zh: 他们真的吓到我了

translation.en: [Peet] Joe is always armed.
translation.zh: 乔总是全副武装

translation.en: There's always a gun at his side.
translation.zh: 他总是带着一把枪

translation.en: [woman] What do you carry that gun for?
translation.zh: 你为什么带着这把枪？

translation.en: People.
translation.zh: 因为人

translation.en: -[man] Not the cats? -Not the cats.
translation.zh: -不是大猫吗？-不是大猫

translation.en: I'd shoot you before I shot my cat.
translation.zh: 我会先对人开枪 后对猫开枪

translation.en: We have 24-hour armed guards,
translation.zh: 我们有24小时的武装警卫

translation.en: three of us wear firearms.
translation.zh: 有三个人配枪

translation.en: That is how bad this has gotten.
translation.zh: 事态就是已经这么糟糕了

translation.en: [Antle] I sleep with an AK-47 under my mattress.
translation.zh: 我睡觉时 床垫下放着一把AK-47

translation.en: Loaded, ready to roll.
translation.zh: 上好膛了 随时待命

translation.en: [man] Joe, he had threats all the time on Facebook.
translation.zh: 乔在脸书上经常受到威胁

translation.en: Had problems with PETA coming onto the park
translation.zh: 他反对善待动物组织进入公园

translation.en: and taking pictures and stuff like that.
translation.zh: 以及拍照什么的

translation.en: And trying to discredit him,
translation.zh: 试图败坏他的名声

translation.en: so he needed extra security.
translation.zh: （马克·汤普森 乔的保镖） 所以他需要额外的安全保障

translation.en: [Rhodes] Over the course of eight years, I would guess we have probably taken
translation.zh: 在八年时间里 我们大概收到了

translation.en: 40 to 50 police reports from Joe.
translation.zh: 40到50份来自乔的警方报告

translation.en: And we have had people try to get on that park.
translation.zh: 我们试过派人到动物园里去

translation.en: This guy has been videotaping.
translation.zh: 这家伙一直在录像

translation.en: And we warned him twice.
translation.zh: 我们警告过他两次

translation.en: And he claims he's with PETA.
translation.zh: 他说他是善待动物组织的

translation.en: [Joe] Main thing is--
translation.zh: 主要问题是…

translation.en: Oh, just investigating some animal rights issues
translation.zh: 只是调查一些动物权益问题

translation.en: that might be happening.
translation.zh: 这种情况可能正在发生

translation.en: [Reinke] They take things to the extreme.
translation.zh: 他们做事很极端

translation.en: Have you got a tiger in a zoo in a cage? Yeah.
translation.zh: 你在动物园笼子里养过老虎吗？是的

translation.en: How are you gonna keep him from running downtown and going to 7-Eleven?
translation.zh: 要怎样才能不让它跑到市区 不让它去7-11？

translation.en: [Antle] Carole, PETA, those characters want to attack everyone.
translation.zh: 卡罗 善待动物组织他们想要攻击所有人

translation.en: Carole wants to be the last man standing.

translation.en: There can be only one, and it has to be her.
translation.zh: 如果最后赢家只有一个那必须得是她

translation.en: [Joe] She's got tens of thousands of people out there brainwashed
translation.zh: 她给成千上万的人洗脑了

translation.en: that we're abusing animals.
translation.zh: 说我们虐待动物

translation.en: I just called her a plain-out hypocrite.
translation.zh: 我觉得她是一个彻头彻尾的伪君子

translation.en: You're open to the public.
translation.zh: 你也对公众开放

translation.en: You're doing boat tours, night tours, day tours, kid tours, kid camps, weddings.
translation.zh: 你们有游船游、夜间游、日间游儿童游、儿童夏令营、婚礼

translation.en: You name it.
translation.zh: 都占全了

translation.en: If you're taking photos and stuff,

translation.en: it'd be great if you would use the hashtag "BigCatRescue,"
translation.zh: 最好能使用“大猫救援会”的标签

translation.en: so you can find us there.
translation.zh: 这样就能找到我们了我们即将打开大门

translation.en: Go ahead and open the gates and go see some cats.
translation.zh: 这样就能找到我们了我们即将打开大门 一起去看看大猫吧

translation.en: [Joe] It's a moneymaker for them.
translation.zh: 那是他们的赚钱工具

translation.en: These tickets sold out really fast,
translation.zh: 门票很快就卖光了

translation.en: and so we're so happy to see all you guys.
translation.zh: 我们很高兴看到大家的到来

translation.en: If you're not fuckin' exploiting animals at that point,
translation.zh: 如果这样都不算剥削动物的话

translation.en: what the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 那你这样到底算什么呢？

translation.en: [Carole] These guys are checking out Max and Mary-Anne.
translation.zh: 这些人在看麦克斯和玛丽安

translation.en: Carole is, I would have to say, a hero of mine.
translation.zh: 要我来说 卡罗是我的英雄

translation.en: She's an awesome advocate for cats.
translation.zh: 她是真正在为大猫的利益着想

translation.en: These animals have a life to live now. A happy life to live.
translation.zh: 这些动物现在能开心地生活在这里了

translation.en: And I tell everyone this is like the Ritz-Carlton of animal sanctuaries,
translation.zh: 我告诉大家 这里就像是动物保护区中的丽思卡尔顿酒店

translation.en: 'cause you just do an amazing job.
translation.zh: 因为你真的干得很棒

translation.en: -Stop it, you're going to make me cry. -I know.
translation.zh: -别说了 我都要哭了-我知道

translation.en: [Kirkham] In my opinion, Carole Baskin was as bad as Joe.
translation.zh: 在我看来 卡罗·巴斯金和乔一样坏

translation.en: They were both, you know,

translation.en: taking advantage of exotic animals to make money.
translation.zh: 都是利用野生动物来赚钱

translation.en: So, to me, it was just a feud.

translation.en: Carole Baskin, yup,
translation.zh: 卡罗·巴斯金 是啊

translation.en: that lady that profits over 1.5 million dollars
translation.zh: 那女人赚了150多万美元

translation.en: suckin' on your heartstrings about shit on the internet
translation.zh: 在网上胡说八道 吸引大家的眼球

translation.en: that ain't even true!
translation.zh: 根本都不是真的！

translation.en: They are always trying to upset me on social media.
translation.zh: 他们总是在社交媒体上诋毁我

translation.en: I got a big mouth and a television station.
translation.zh: 我有一张大嘴 还有一家电视台

translation.en: -[chuckles] It seems to be. -[Goode] And that works.
translation.zh: -这很有用-貌似是的

translation.en: Why would you give to a facility to rescue animals
translation.zh: 为什么要把钱捐给这种动物救助机构

translation.en: to live in luxurious cages?
translation.zh: 让动物住在豪华的笼子里？

translation.en: Well, how about that one?
translation.zh: 这笼子怎么样？

translation.en: That mountain lion is sticking his head through a hole in the fence
translation.zh: 那只美洲狮从笼子的洞里探出头来

translation.en: in order to drink out of a--
translation.zh: 就为了喝一口水

translation.en: Joe started bashing her. She started bashing him.
translation.zh: 乔开始抨击她 她也开始抨击乔

translation.en: You know, getting the mall shows canceled.
translation.zh: 你知道 让商场演出取消

translation.en: And she put up billboards, and she made this 911 animal abuse site.
translation.zh: 她贴了很多广告牌还做了911动物虐待网站

translation.en: Joe was one of the top contenders on it.
translation.zh: 乔在里面排名第一

translation.en: Carole would now and then put up something online
translation.zh: 卡罗有时会在网上发布一些东西

translation.en: about how Joe's breeding and he's bad and all this.
translation.zh: 关于乔饲养动物有多坏什么的

translation.en: And he would go off on his internet show.
translation.zh: 而他会在网络节目中大声咆哮

translation.en: I consider that bitch to be one of the biggest terrorists
translation.zh: 我觉得那女人是野生动物世界里

translation.en: in the exotic animal world right now.
translation.zh: 最大的恐怖分子之一

translation.en: It is financially draining to fight this woman.
translation.zh: 跟这个女人战斗是很耗钱的

translation.en: [Carole] To get a little bit of background on Joe,
translation.zh: 想要了解乔的背景知识

translation.en: all you gotta do is go to tigercubabuse.com.
translation.zh: 你只需要登陆tigercubabuse.com

translation.en: We got undercover video of him using a 20-week-old cub
translation.zh: 我们拍到他让一只20周大的幼崽

translation.en: that jumped on this little boy and bit him on the leg.
translation.zh: 跳到小男孩身上 结果咬了他的腿

translation.en: [Antle] She's ruthless.
translation.zh: 她很无情

translation.en: Most of us are not ruthless.
translation.zh: 我们大多数人不是无情的

translation.en: People who really love animals are rarely ruthless.
translation.zh: 真正喜欢动物的人都不是无情的

translation.en: [Carole] There shouldn't have to be a place that rescues big cats from abuse
translation.zh: 这个国家就不应该这样 需要有专门组织去救助被虐待的大型猫科动物

translation.en: in this country.
translation.zh: 需要有专门组织去救助被虐待的大型猫科动物

translation.en: What we're asking you to do is champion the Big Cat Public Safety Act.
translation.zh: 我们请求各位拥护《大猫公共安全法》

translation.en: The Big Cat Public Safety Act would end the ownership
translation.zh: 《大猫公共安全法》将禁止

translation.en: of big cats as exotic pets
translation.zh: 把野生大猫当作宠物饲养

translation.en: and prohibit exhibitors from allowing the public to have contact with them.
translation.zh: 禁止参展商允许公众与它们接触

translation.en: The Big Cat Safety Act, if passed,
translation.zh: 《大猫安全法》 如果通过

translation.en: it will destroy private zoos across America.
translation.zh: 如果通过 将摧毁全美境内所有的私家动物园

translation.en: [Joe] For Carole... and all of her friends that are watching out there,
translation.zh: 卡罗…以及她正在观看的朋友们

translation.en: before you bring me down...
translation.zh: 在你们打倒我之前

translation.en: it is my belief...
translation.zh: 我坚信…

translation.en: that you will stop breathing.
translation.zh: 你们将会一命呜呼

translation.en: It got pretty ugly.
translation.zh: 场面十分难堪了

translation.en: We hear it's Carole's birthday next month.
translation.zh: 我们听说下个月是卡罗的生日

translation.en: And we're shipping her two of these!
translation.zh: 我们要给她寄两条蛇过去！

translation.en: Look at the fangs on that!
translation.zh: 看看它的尖牙！

translation.en: [Carole] One day I went out to open up the mailbox and it just exploded with snakes.
translation.zh: 有一天 我打开邮箱 发现里面都是蛇

translation.en: There are crazy people out there who want to see me dead.
translation.zh: 外面有些疯子想看到我死

translation.en: Happy birthday, Carole.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 卡罗

translation.en: What... keeps me up at night
translation.zh: 让我夜不能寐的

translation.en: is worrying about them hurting a family member to get to me.
translation.zh: 是担心他们伤害我的家人 来报复我

translation.en: It was just a... hate.
translation.zh: 就是单纯的仇恨

translation.en: He has hate for Carole Baskin. Nasty hate.
translation.zh: 他恨卡罗·巴斯金 恨到骨子里了

translation.en: A hundred rounds of .223.
translation.zh: 100发点223口径子弹

translation.en: You got it. Is that gonna be it or do you need any explosives today?
translation.zh: 好的 就要这些 还是今天需要炸药？

translation.en: [Goode] Carole's taking a nap.

translation.en: There, I've got every animal rights person all in one row.
translation.zh: 好了 我把所有动物权益保护者排成一排 全部击毙

translation.en: Dynamite. [laughs]
translation.zh: 炸药

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Aim... Fire.
translation.zh: 瞄准…射击

translation.en: [operator] This is a prepaid call from...
translation.zh: 这通预付费电话来自…

translation.en: [Joe] Joe Exotic.
translation.zh: 乔野生

translation.en: [operator] ...an inmate at the Grady County Jail.
translation.zh: 格雷迪郡监狱的一名囚犯

translation.en: [Joe] I'm in a cage.
translation.zh: 我被关起来了

translation.en: Do you know why animals die in cages?
translation.zh: 你知道为什么动物会死在笼子里吗？

translation.en: Their soul dies.
translation.zh: 它们的灵魂死掉了

translation.en: I'm not gonna be accused and go to prison,
translation.zh: 我不会被指控 然后进监狱

translation.en: and lose everything I have for things that other people did.
translation.zh: 也不会因为别人做的事而失去一切

translation.en: Before this is over with,
translation.zh: 在这一切结束之前

translation.en: I'm gonna shut down everybody.
translation.zh: 我要让大家都闭嘴

translation.en: [Joe] With our ever-changing climate, in our world today,
translation.zh: 当今世界 气候不断变化

translation.en: and you're outside working in the weather elements,
translation.zh: 你在室外工作 风吹日晒雨淋

translation.en: when you come in at night and you wanna feel good,
translation.zh: 晚上回家时 如果想要好好对待自己

translation.en: reach for America's favorite skincare products:
translation.zh: 就可以使用美国人最喜欢的护肤品

translation.en: Tiger King Skincare.
translation.zh: 虎王护肤品
